name: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
description: Actively manage (inventory, track, and correct) all enterprise assets connected to the infrastructure physically, virtually, remotely, and within cloud environments.

name: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
description: Actively manage (inventory, track, and correct) all software on the network so that only authorized software is installed and can execute.

name: Data Protection
description: Develop processes and technical controls to identify, classify, securely handle, retain, and dispose of data.

name: Secure Configuration of Enterprise Assets and Software
description: Establish and maintain the secure configuration of enterprise assets and software.

name: Account Management
description: Use processes and tools to assign and manage authorization to credentials for user accounts, including administrator and service accounts.

name: Access Control Management
description: Use processes and tools to create, assign, manage, and revoke access credentials and privileges for user, administrator, and service accounts.

name: Continuous Vulnerability Management
description: Develop a plan to continuously assess and track vulnerabilities on all enterprise assets within the enterprise's infrastructure.

name: Audit Log Management
description: Collect, alert, review, and retain audit logs of events that could help detect, understand, or recover from an attack.

name: Email and Web Browser Protections
description: Improve protections and detections of threats from email and web vectors, as these are opportunities for attackers to manipulate human behavior.

name: Malware Defenses
description: Prevent or control the installation, spread, and execution of malicious applications, code, or scripts on enterprise assets.

name: Data Recovery
description: Establish and maintain data recovery practices sufficient to restore in-scope enterprise assets to a pre-incident and trusted state.

name: Network Infrastructure Management
description: Establish, implement, and actively manage network devices to prevent attackers from exploiting vulnerable network services.

name: Network Monitoring and Defense
description: Operate processes and tooling to establish and maintain comprehensive network monitoring and defense against security threats.

name: Security Awareness and Skills Training
description: Establish and maintain a security awareness program to influence behavior among the workforce to be security conscious and properly skilled.

name: Service Provider Management
description: Develop a process to evaluate service providers who hold sensitive data or are responsible for critical IT platforms or processes.

name: Application Software Security
description: Manage the security life cycle of in-house developed, hosted, or acquired software to prevent, detect, and remediate security weaknesses.

name: Incident Response Management
description: Establish a program to develop and maintain an incident response capability to prepare, detect, and quickly respond to an attack.

name: Penetration Testing
description: Test the effectiveness and resiliency of enterprise assets through identifying and exploiting weaknesses in controls.
